pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert at multi-agent integration and PDDL modeling. Your role is to take the structured peg reports from the agents and produce a complete PDDL domain and PDDL problem that models the Tower of Hanoi instance for the FastDownward planner. The PDDL must include objects for disks and pegs, predicates representing disk positions and clear tops, and a move action that enforces that only one disk moves at a time and that no larger disk may be placed on a smaller disk. Use the agents reports to set the initial state and use the public goal configuration for the goal state. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Ensure action names and predicates are unambiguous and planner-friendly for FastDownward.
pddl.prompt: You are orchestrator. Integrate the following structured reports from the three peg observers. Use them to produce a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem that will let the FastDownward planner find a solution from the observed initial state to the declared goal. Here is the left peg report {state_left}. Here is the middle peg report {state_middle}. Here is the right peg report {state_right}. The target goal is {agents->orchestrator->goal}.
